TopicTitle: Mechanical Mouse Industries - Kethane & Payload Packs Released!!!

Articles.Content:
Hi, i'm new at this. What do you do/how do you install and get the plugins?

Thanks

There are some tutorials on the forum, check them out.
little preview of how the first set of parts for kethane plugin.

me want.....me want.....

when can we expect to be using these parts? within a week? less? more?

we hope within a few days. We still need to do some little coding and bugtesting. Its actually going so well, that we might skip Beta and go directly to release.

And we are looking at redoing the the texture and some of the models of the satellite pack. Current concept stages:
I just had a bad image of HAL from 2001 somehow making it into KSP.... your pack would compliment the glowing red lens quite well.

hello i hope someone can helkp me here,

i cant get the mod to work properly.

when i use the solar panels and launch the rocket the game sort of crashes.

i cant do anything and when i end it and restart the flight the game freezes.

i got the PowerTech, MuMechLib and the PowerTech_MuMech plugins installed.

affcorse i have olso the mechjeb mod and this mod istalled.

olso i tried a complete reinstall but it doesnt help.

please can anyone help me?

we hope within a few days. We still need to do some little coding and bugtesting. Its actually going so well, that we might skip Beta and go directly to release.

And we are looking at redoing the the texture and some of the models of the satellite pack. Current concept stages:

I actually really liked the look of the original test pack, with its shiny foil outsides, but if you do decide to go with these, I think you should keep the glowing and shiny bits. Those are cool.

hello i hope someone can helkp me here,

i cant get the mod to work properly.

when i use the solar panels and launch the rocket the game sort of crashes.

i cant do anything and when i end it and restart the flight the game freezes.

i got the PowerTech, MuMechLib and the PowerTech_MuMech plugins installed.

affcorse i have olso the mechjeb mod and this mod istalled.

olso i tried a complete reinstall but it doesnt help.

please can anyone help me?

Sadly I cannot help you with this. It seems the problem is more computer related then my pack. I doubt this is also caused by the plugin. I suggest you to the support forum.

If the crashing is caused indeed by installing everything what you said, then you have to systematically remove everything 1 by 1 to identify the problem.

I actually really liked the look of the original test pack, with its shiny foil outsides, but if you do decide to go with these, I think you should keep the glowing and shiny bits. Those are cool.

The glowing stuff will stay, no worries

thats to bad i hoped i missed some pluggins.

i cant find the mumech solarpanels plugins becouse on the first page it says

Required Plugins: PowerTech + MuMech Solarpanels & MuMech
So, I kind of like the actual texture pack, but I don't know what will you do - you always find a way to make this better than it was!

thats to bad i hoped i missed some pluggins.

i cant find the mumech solarpanels plugins becouse on the first page it says

Required Plugins: PowerTech + MuMech Solarpanels & MuMech

That is PowerTech-MuMech adaptor. The link is somewhere in the middle of PowerTech thread OP (I still need to rewrite this post, but the new forum engine sets too harsh size limitations)

Here's the link to the current version

http://www./?dp4dbkw6i08zbc0

I downloaded and installed the plugins and parts. But the 'Regular solar panel' part is saying it can't be used my version. I'm using v0.16. Evey other part works though? Kind of renders this mod useless atm.

Looking forward to the kethane part.

well that did the job somehow...

i replaced the PowerTech-MuMech adaptor with your link and now it works yeahh!!

thank very much
Dani-Sang do you have any plans for 1m batteries?

Fantastic work! Kudos

I'm currently having anothe problem, though. I got all the right plug-ins, but solar panels don't show up at all, except an orange big one (already deployed) and radiation shielding.

Is there something I'm missing? Thanks in advance

I downloaded and installed the plugins and parts. But the 'Regular solar panel' part is saying it can't be used my version. I'm using v0.16. Evey other part works though? Kind of renders this mod useless atm.

Looking forward to the kethane part.

You don't have all the correct plugins installed. Install the latest plugins.

well that did the job somehow...

i replaced the PowerTech-MuMech adaptor with your link and now it works yeahh!!

thank very much

The guy above can learn from you... enjoy the pack

Dani-Sang do you have any plans for 1m batteries?

Already modeled and planned for next release along new textures.

Fantastic work! Kudos

I'm currently having anothe problem, though. I got all the right plug-ins, but solar panels don't show up at all, except an orange big one (already deployed) and radiation shielding.

Is there something I'm missing? Thanks in advance

Those aren't my models, pretty sure from somewhere else.

Did you install the powertech mumech adapter plugin?
Thanks for the fast response. I'll download the plug-ins again.
I love the pack. Awesome work.

I love the pack. Awesome work.

ThQ Sir!!!!!!!
I can't wait to see what you come up with for payloads. Everything so far has been awesome work though. Thanks.

I can't wait to see what you come up with for payloads. Everything so far has been awesome work though. Thanks.

ThQ,

Thank for the kind words people, a picture as reward. Working towards the new style of satellites. You might be asking... why red? Well... I'll explain that when I release the new version.
Nice, I really like the style of the thruster where the nozzles are pointed outwards.
will kethane work with the fuel transfer mod? i hope so because i could create massive kethane mining stations to refuel large craft
